REACTER_MSG_000:
̄You sense a violent Ra Reaction.
You should investigate this area carefully.
TRANSFER_01_MSG: Would you like to use the Transportation Device to reach the Darkiron Bastille?Ă
DONT_USE_TRANSFER_010: The Transporation Device is offline. You won't be able to use it at this time.
SYSTEM_MSG_000:
Use this device to
travel to the Core?Ă
DONT_USE_TELEPORTER_010:
The Transfer Device is not active.
It cannot be used at this time.
GIM_BOX_REC_01:
̄I'm detecting a form of life, from inside of the box.
Would you like to see what's inside?Ă
GIM_BOX_REC_02: The monster in the container attacked!
GIM_BOX_REC_03: ̄There is an item in this container. Would you like he open it?Ă
CORD_REC_02:
Recieved data from the container!
Learned of the Fiery Volcano's hidden data!
REC_POINT_DRONE_HOLE_02: ̄It looks hollow inside. You can check it out using the drone.
VOLCANO_BIRDY_REC:
̄A monster who befriended the hero, Anses.
Friendly, kind-hearted, and always ready to serve.
VOLCANO_DEATHBURN_REC: ̄A monster minion of the Dark Master, with such a fierce look that it strikes fear into the hearts of its enemies.
REC_POINT_02_02: ̄Space-travel device leading Monster Masters to the Virtual Colosseum.
PSEUDO_DEMO_BIRDY:
́See? It is no problema! Just like last time, you will just
learn it once more inside the Virtual Colosseum!
ā
It should not be that hard for you Señor Anses, no? Hondele, Señor! 
A mal tiempo, buena cara!
DEMO_506_AFT_BIRDY: ́Lo siento, Señor Anses! Inspect the Monolith, enter that Colosseum, and regain your ability to Aerial Ride!
DEMO_517_AFT_BIRDY:
́Interesante... I see no entrance to this so-called base.
Do you have any ideas, Señor Anses?
DEMO_520_AFT_BIRDY:
́I'm going to let you lead me from here on, amigo!
Like good old times, side-by-side, no matter what!
REC_POINT_09_02:
̄When the Break World was created, this
Water Scooter was put here through some miracle.
REC_POINT_01_02: ̄Once was the central point of the Resistance Headquarters.
MINE_HEART_COMN_MSG:
The Water Scooter floats atop a
distortion in space-time.
REC_POINT_03_02: ̄The most important secret base that the Resistance built. It is protected by a myriad of monsters.
MINE_HEART_EVENT_MSG:
The Water Scooter floats atop a
distortion in space-time. 
ā
A strong reaction is resonating from the 
heart fragments ȁ found!
REC_POINT_04_02: ̄Town that has been made inside of a Volcano. Just standing around nearby makes you sweat profusely.
REC_POINT_05_02: ̄This man-made transporter is connected to the Darkiron Bastille.
REC_POINT_06_02:
̄A celestial body that exists in the center of the world. 
There is no more data on it.
REC_POINT_07_02:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
REC_POINT_08_02: ̄A device that will activate Masters Road for those who wish to improve their riding technique.1
NPC_REC_HIHYUDORA_010:
̄ Sent by the Djinn to lay waste to this planet.
It lacks any logic or reason, so trying to converse is pointless.
REC_RA_DOOR_011:
̄A door leading to another world. It was discovered
by in the Mirror of Ra's reflection, which shows the truth.
REC_RA_DOOR_030: They don't appear to have any significance at this time...
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄It has been infected by the Insurgent Demon.
It has an incredibly large amount of power.
